2024 年 7 月 30 日星期二 00:30:06 +0000 TED 每日演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png TED 每日演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
无限能量的秘密力量？激光|马塔米马塔米In 2022, physicist Tammy Ma and the team at Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory achieved a scientific breakthrough decades in the making: fusion ignition, or the combining of two atoms to generate more energy out of a reaction than was put in — recreating on Earth the same process that powers the Sun. She explains how they used a giant laser (way, way bigger than you're thinking) to catalyze this reaction and shares a vision for how this technology could change the world by creating limitless clean energy.无限能量的秘密力量？激光|马塔米In 2022, physicist Tammy Ma and the team at Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory achieved a scientific breakthrough decades in the making: fusion ignition, or the combining of two atoms to generate more energy out of a reaction than was put in — recreating on Earth the same process that powers the Sun. She explains how they used a giant laser (way, way bigger than you're thinking) to catalyze this reaction and shares a vision for how this technology could change the world by creating limitless clean energy. https://www.ted.com/talks/tammy_ma_the_secret_force_for_limitless_energy_lasers?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:134418 134418 Mon, 29 Jul 2024 14:53:02 +0000高等教育不00:13:36泰德
战争新闻应该植根于同理心，而不是暴力|贝尔特鲁贝尔特鲁We need journalism that moves beyond a constant focus on violence and honestly depicts the full impact of war, in and out of the trenches, says conflict journalist Bel Trew. She makes a passionate call for war reporting to be rooted in compassion and truth, sharing stories that illuminate the human toll of conflict with the hope of healing our fractured world.战争新闻应该植根于同理心，而不是暴力|贝尔特鲁We need journalism that moves beyond a constant focus on violence and honestly depicts the full impact of war, in and out of the trenches, says conflict journalist Bel Trew. She makes a passionate call for war reporting to be rooted in compassion and truth, sharing stories that illuminate the human toll of conflict with the hope of healing our fractured world. https://www.ted.com/talks/bel_trew_war_journalism_should_be_rooted_in_empathy_not_violence?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:135109 135109 Fri, 26 Jul 2024 14:45:58 +0000高等教育不00:14:48泰德
食物和气候问题——以及如何解决它|乔纳森·弗利乔纳森·弗利Global food production — from meat to grains — accounts for a third of all greenhouse gas emissions, says sustainability scientist Jonathan Foley. He presents a portfolio of data-backed solutions to build a better food system world-wide, starting with four key steps to cut emissions.食物和气候问题——以及如何解决它|乔纳森·弗利Global food production — from meat to grains — accounts for a third of all greenhouse gas emissions, says sustainability scientist Jonathan Foley. He presents a portfolio of data-backed solutions to build a better food system world-wide, starting with four key steps to cut emissions. https://www.ted.com/talks/jonathan_foley_the_problem_with_food_and_climate_and_how_to_fix_it?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:135050 135050 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 14:59:40 +0000高等教育不00:12:01泰德
建筑如何从内到外改善生活 |宋多丽丝宋多丽丝Architect and building tech innovator Doris Sung presents a compelling vision for reimagining building facades as active contributors to urban life and public health. Showcasing innovative technologies — like buildings that filter particulates out of the air and facades that react to heat — Sung demonstrates how modern architecture can evolve beyond aesthetics to address critical issues like pollution, energy efficiency and urban heat islands, offering a glimpse into a future where architecture improves life for inhabitants and pedestrians alike.建筑如何从内到外改善生活 |宋多丽丝Architect and building tech innovator Doris Sung presents a compelling vision for reimagining building facades as active contributors to urban life and public health. Showcasing innovative technologies — like buildings that filter particulates out of the air and facades that react to heat — Sung demonstrates how modern architecture can evolve beyond aesthetics to address critical issues like pollution, energy efficiency and urban heat islands, offering a glimpse into a future where architecture improves life for inhabitants and pedestrians alike. https://www.ted.com/talks/doris_sung_how_buildings_can_improve_life_inside_and_out?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:134948 134948 Thu, 25 Jul 2024 14:57:34 +0000高等教育不00:10:54泰德
卫星帮助减缓气候变化——现在|米莉·朱·贝尔德米莉·朱·贝尔德Meet MethaneSAT: the satellite circling Earth right now to track global emissions from methane: a highly potent, short-term greenhouse gas. Environmental advocate Millie Chu Baird details the heat-trapping side effects of a planet full of methane — and explains why understanding where it comes from and taking steps to reduce it is the single most important thing we can do to affect climate change in our lifetimes. (MethaneSAT is part of the Audacious Project, TED's initiative to inspire and fund global change.)卫星帮助减缓气候变化——现在|米莉·朱·贝尔德Meet MethaneSAT: the satellite circling Earth right now to track global emissions from methane: a highly potent, short-term greenhouse gas. Environmental advocate Millie Chu Baird details the heat-trapping side effects of a planet full of methane — and explains why understanding where it comes from and taking steps to reduce it is the single most important thing we can do to affect climate change in our lifetimes. (MethaneSAT is part of the Audacious Project, TED's initiative to inspire and fund global change.) https://www.ted.com/talks/millie_chu_baird_the_satellite_helping_slow_climate_change_right_now?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:134732 134732 Wed, 24 Jul 2024 14:37:38 +0000高等教育不00:07:32泰德
当艺术属于每个人时，一切皆有可能 |李尔·德贝索内与布莱恩·斯托克斯·米切尔李尔·德贝索内与布莱恩·斯托克斯·米切尔With huge, city-wide casts from an array of communities, theater director Lear deBessonet's productions illuminate the unique power of the arts to transform our lives through collective expression. She explores the power of spectacle to inspire awe, connect individuals and heal loneliness with tangible, life-changing results. In a dramatic moment, deBessonet's message comes to life when Broadway star Brian Stokes Mitchell takes the stage for a dazzling performance of "The Impossible Dream (The Quest)," accompanied by pianist Todd Almond, the MEI Screaming Eagles Marching Band and some surprise vocalists.当艺术属于每个人时，一切皆有可能 |李尔·德贝索内与布莱恩·斯托克斯·米切尔With huge, city-wide casts from an array of communities, theater director Lear deBessonet's productions illuminate the unique power of the arts to transform our lives through collective expression. She explores the power of spectacle to inspire awe, connect individuals and heal loneliness with tangible, life-changing results. In a dramatic moment, deBessonet's message comes to life when Broadway star Brian Stokes Mitchell takes the stage for a dazzling performance of "The Impossible Dream (The Quest)," accompanied by pianist Todd Almond, the MEI Screaming Eagles Marching Band and some surprise vocalists. https://www.ted.com/talks/lear_debessonet_with_brian_stokes_mitchell_what_s_possible_when_the_arts_belong_to_everybody?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:134733 134733 Mon, 22 Jul 2024 14:51:41 +0000高等教育不00:14:57泰德
“Cant de la Sibil·la”/“Quien Más Me Ama”|玛丽亚·阿纳尔玛丽亚·阿纳尔Barcelona-based singer-songwriter Maria Arnal performs two songs blending her passions for technology and art with folk and techno-pop soundscapes. Using Holly+ (a digital twin of musician Holly Herndon's voice), alongside AI-generated voices and a portable organ controlled through her laptop, she sings a cover of a medieval apocalyptic chant followed by a new release. “Cant de la Sibil·la”/“Quien Más Me Ama”|玛丽亚·阿纳尔Barcelona-based singer-songwriter Maria Arnal performs two songs blending her passions for technology and art with folk and techno-pop soundscapes. 勇敢、才华和鲁保罗·查尔斯 |现场|鲁保罗·查尔斯鲁保罗·查尔斯In the debut of TED's new "On the Spot" rapid-fire Q&A format, Emmy-winning television superstar and drag icon RuPaul Charles answers questions about bravery, brilliance and more — all with his signature wit and wisdom. Get a glimpse inside RuPaul's head and hear his thoughts on the power of drag, the best way to slay, the most important personality trait -- and the best advice he's ever been given. (Featuring an equally rapid-fire Q&A with TED's Helen Walters.)勇敢、才华和鲁保罗·查尔斯 |现场|鲁保罗·查尔斯In the debut of TED's new "On the Spot" rapid-fire Q&A format, Emmy-winning television superstar and drag icon RuPaul Charles answers questions about bravery, brilliance and more — all with his signature wit and wisdom. 如何宣称你的领导力 |迈克尔·蒂姆斯迈克尔·蒂姆斯When faced with challenges, do you often seek someone else to blame? Leadership expert Michael Timms shows why this instinct is counterproductive, highlighting three effective habits of self-accountability that will empower you and others to make positive change — whether at home or at work.如何宣称你的领导力 |迈克尔·蒂姆斯When faced with challenges, do you often seek someone else to blame? Leadership expert Michael Timms shows why this instinct is counterproductive, highlighting three effective habits of self-accountability that will empower you and others to make positive change — whether at home or at work. https://www.ted.com/talks/michael_timms_how_to_claim_your_leadership_power_jul_2024?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:134129 134129 Thu, 18 Jul 2024 15:06:41 +0000高等教育不00:11:22泰德
为什么年轻人的境况比他们的父母更糟糕——以及对此该怎么办？斯科特·加洛韦斯科特·加洛韦In this special conversation, NYU marketing professor Scott Galloway and head of TED Chris Anderson dive deeper into Galloway’s explosive recent TED Talk, which has been seen by millions and ignited conversations about what he calls “the great intergenerational theft,” or how older generations are stealing prosperity from the young. With razor-sharp insights on the skyrocketing cost of housing, the mental health crisis created by social media, reckless government spending and more, Galloway explores bold solutions to the most pressing issues facing young people — and delivers a few spectacular rants along the way. If you’ve already seen Galloway's TED Talk, skip ahead to 20:25. (Visit ted.com/membership to support TED today and join more exclusive events like this one.)为什么年轻人的境况比他们的父母更糟糕——以及对此该怎么办？斯科特·加洛韦In this special conversation, NYU marketing professor Scott Galloway and head of TED Chris Anderson dive deeper into Galloway’s explosive recent TED Talk, which has been seen by millions and ignited conversations about what he calls “the great intergenerational theft,” or how older generations are stealing prosperity from the young. With razor-sharp insights on the skyrocketing cost of housing, the mental health crisis created by social media, reckless government spending and more, Galloway explores bold solutions to the most pressing issues facing young people — and delivers a few spectacular rants along the way. If you’ve already seen Galloway's TED Talk, skip ahead to 20:25. (Visit ted.com/membership to support TED today and join more exclusive events like this one.) https://www.ted.com/talks/scott_galloway_why_young_people_are_worse_off_than_their_parents_and_what_to_do_about_it?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:134516 134516 Thu, 18 Jul 2024 15:04:46 +0000高等教育不00:56:10泰德
量子计算机不是你想象的那样——它们更酷 |哈特穆特·内文哈特穆特·内文Quantum computers obtain superpowers by tapping into parallel universes, says Hartmut Neven, the founder and lead of Google Quantum AI. He explains how this emerging tech can far surpass traditional computers by relying on quantum physics rather than binary logic, and shares a roadmap to build the ultimate quantum computer. Learn how this fascinating and powerful tech can help humanity take on seemingly unsolvable problems in medicine, sustainable energy, AI, neuroscience and more.量子计算机不是你想象的那样——它们更酷 |哈特穆特·内文Quantum computers obtain superpowers by tapping into parallel universes, says Hartmut Neven, the founder and lead of Google Quantum AI. He explains how this emerging tech can far surpass traditional computers by relying on quantum physics rather than binary logic, and shares a roadmap to build the ultimate quantum computer. Learn how this fascinating and powerful tech can help humanity take on seemingly unsolvable problems in medicine, sustainable energy, AI, neuroscience and more. https://www.ted.com/talks/hartmut_neven_quantum_computers_aren_t_what_you_think_they_re_cooler?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:134650 134650 Wed, 17 Jul 2024 15:32:34 +0000高等教育不00:11:35泰德
